sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些副词均可表示"主要地，大量地"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: mainly, chiefly, greatly, largely, mostly, primarily, principally, generally
means: mainly ： 指主要部分，突出在一系列事物中的相对重要性。
chiefly ： 侧重某人或某物在众多的人或物中占主要和显著地位。
greatly ： 通常强调程度的高。
largely ： 着重范围或分量大大超过别的成分。
mostly ： 强调数量占多半，近乎全部。
primarily ： 侧重基本地，首要地。

sentence.Network_en: Henry generally stayed ahead of the others in the academic subjects.
sentence.Network_cn: 亨利的文化课成绩通常都优于其他学生。

sentence.Network_en: Girls generally reach sexual maturity two years earlier than boys.
sentence.Network_cn: 通常女孩性发育成熟要比男孩早两年。

sentence.Network_en: She had few friends, and was generally not very happy.
sentence.Network_cn: 她几乎没什么朋友，总的来说不怎么开心。

entry.def: You use generally to give a summary of a situation, activity, or idea without referring to the particular details of it.

example.ex: University teachers generally have admitted a lack of enthusiasm about their subjects...
example.tran: 高校教师大体上承认对其所教专业缺乏热情。

example.ex: Speaking generally, the space enterprise has served astronomy well.
example.tran: 总的说来，航空企业很好地促进了天文学的发展。

entry.def: You use generally to say that something happens or is used on most occasions but not on every occasion.

example.ex: As women we generally say and feel too much about these things...
example.tran: 作为女性，我们通常在这些事情上谈得过多，过于敏锐。

example.ex: It is generally true that the darker the fruit the higher its iron content...
example.tran: 一般来说，水果颜色越深，含铁量就越高。

sentences.sentence: "by and large it doesn't rain much here"

means.word_mean: 2. without distinction of one from others;

sentences.sentence: "he is interested in snakes in general"

means.word_mean: 3. without regard to specific details or exceptions;

auth_sentence.content: The winters are cold but generally dry and sunny.
auth_sentence.res_content: The winters are cold but generally dry and sunny.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The winters are cold but generally dry and sunny.

auth_sentence.content: Butt's direction is generally sound, sometimes inspired.
auth_sentence.res_content: Butt's direction is generally sound, sometimes inspired.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Butt's direction is generally sound, sometimes inspired.

auth_sentence.content: Our response to these requests has generally been robust.
auth_sentence.res_content: Our response to these requests has generally been robust.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Our response to these requests has generally been robust.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表形容词,表示"……的",通常在在名词后.; 2. 表副词,放在形容词后,"……地"

stems_affixes.word_buile: come来+ly……的→翩翩而来→美丽动人的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 昂贵的,价值高的,豪华的
stems_affixes.word_buile: cost代价+ly……的→adj.昂贵的,价值高的,豪华的
drizz毛毛雨+ly……的→adj.毛毛雨的[a drizzly day]
friend朋友+ly……的→adj.友好的,友谊的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 很可能的,合适的,可靠的
stems_affixes.word_buile: like像+ly……的→adj.很可能的,合适的,可靠的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 活泼的,活跃的;栩栩如生的,真实的
stems_affixes.word_buile: live活+ly……的→adj.活泼的,活跃的;栩栩如生的,真实的
man男人+ly……的→adj.男子气概的,果断的
niggard小气鬼+ly……的→adj.吝啬的,勉强的
otherworld超世+ly……的→adj.超脱尘世的,超俗的
spindle细长的人[或物]+ly……的→spindly细长的,纤弱的
time时间+ly……的→adj.及时的,适时的
week周+ly……的→adj.每星期的,一周的 adv.每周一次 n.周刊,周报
month月+ly……的→adj.每月的 adv.每月一次,按月 n.月刊
continuous连续的+ly……的→adv.不断地,连续地

stems_affixes.value_cn: 幸福地,愉快地,恰当地,幸亏
stems_affixes.word_buile: happy快乐的,幸福的+ly……的→happily幸福地
active积极的+ly……地→adv.活跃地,积极地
week周+ly……的→adj.每星期的,一周的 adv.每周一次 n.周刊,周报
month月+ly……的→adj.每月的 adv.每月一次,按月 n.月刊
according相符的+ly……地→adv.因此,从而
final最后的+ly……地→adv.最后,终于

stems_affixes.value_cn: 实际上,事实上,竟然,居然,如今
stems_affixes.word_buile: actual[adj.实际的, 真实的, 现行的, 目前的]+ly……地→adv.实际上,事实上,竟然,居然,如今
adequate足够的+ly……地→adv.充分地
consequent作为结果的+ly……地→adv.从而,因此
anxious担忧的+ly……地→adv.忧虑地,不安地
biological[adj.生物学的]+ly……地→adv.生物学上
certain肯定的+ly……地→adv.的确,[口语]当然,行
chief主要的+ly……地→adv.首要,主要地
commercial商业的+ly……地→adv.商业上,通商上

stems_affixes.value_cn: 普遍地,通常地,现在,当前
stems_affixes.word_buile: current当前的,流动的+ly……地→adv.普遍地,通常地,现在,当前
decided确定的+ly……地→adv.果断地,断然地
definite明确的+ly……地→adv.一定地,明确地
easy容易的+ly……地→easily容易地
economical节约的,经济的+ly……地→adv.经济地,经济学地
exact强求,精确的+ly……地→adv.正确地,严密地
exceeding非常的+ly……地→adv.极端地,非常
excessive过分的+ly……地→adv.过分地,非常地
extreme极端的+ly……地→adv.极端地,极其,非常
aggressive侵略的+ly……地→adv. 侵略地,攻势地
financial财政的,金融的+ly……地→adv.财政上,金融上
formal正式的;形式的+ly……地→adv.正式地,形式上
fortunate幸运的+ly……地→adv.幸运地
general总的,大体的+ly……地→adv.一般,通常,一般地
glorious光荣的,显赫的+ly……地→adv.光荣地,辉煌地
great大的+ly……地→adv.大大地,非常
immediate立即的+ly……地→adv.立即,马上,直接地
incidental附带的+ly……地→adv.附带地,顺便提及
increasing渐增的+ly……地→adv.日益,愈加
instant立即的;紧迫的+ly……地→adv.立即地,即刻地
like像+ly……地→有些像的→很可能
logical逻辑的,符合逻辑的+ly……地→adv.论理上,逻辑上
mental精神的+ly……地→adv.精神上,智力上,在内心
moderate中等的,适度的+ly……地→adv.适度地
natural自然的+ly……地→adv.自然地
necessary必要的+ly……地→necessarily必要地
polite有礼貌的+ly……地→adv.客气地,斯文地,优雅地
positive肯定的,积极的+ly……地→adv.断然地;肯定地
preferable更可取的+ly……地→preferably更适宜
present现在+ly……地→adv.目前,不久
probable可能的+ly……地→probably或许,大概
progressive前进的+ly……地→adv.日益增多地
prompt敏捷的+ly……地→adv.敏捷地,迅速地
relative相对的;相关的+ly……地→adv.相关地
repeated重复的+ly表副词→adv.重复地,再三地

stems_affixes.value_cn: 立刻,不久,简略地,简言之,即刻
stems_affixes.word_buile: short短+ly……地→adv.立刻,不久,简略地,简言之,即刻
sufficient足够的+ly……地→adv.十分地,充分地
undoubted无疑的,确实的+ly……地→adv.无庸置疑地,的确地
unfortunate不幸的+ly……地→adv.不幸地
uniform贯的,一致的+ly……地→adv.一律地,均一地
week周+ly……的→adj.每星期的,一周的 adv.每周一次 n.周刊,周报
month月+ly……的→adj.每月的 adv.每月一次,按月 n.月刊

Sentence.sentence: It causes more harm than is generally realized.

And most noticeable of all, there is the phenomenon of large urban and suburban high schools that have split up into smaller units of a few hundred, generally housed in the same grounds that once boasted thousands of students all marching to the same band.
This week's announcement of a new iPhone by a management team led by Tim Cook, who replaced Mr Jobs as chief executive in August, was generally regarded as competent but uninspiring.
Bond prices generally fluctuate inversely (相反地)with current market interest rates.
G) Those schools usually require essays of their own, but the longest essay, 500 words maximum, is generally attached to the Common Application.
They are generally treated as equals by men

means.word_mean: 一般地, 通常, 大体上, 广泛地, 普遍地

sentences.en: We generally go to the sea for our holidays.
I generally stay at home in the evening and am not at home on Saturday evening.
sentences.cn: 我晚上通常在家里, 而星期六晚上不在家。

sentences.en: He failed to explain his meaning generally.
sentences.cn: 他未能把自己的意思完全说清楚。

sentences.en: Generally speaking, parents love their children.
sentences.cn: 一般说来, 父母爱他们的孩子。

jushi.english: He failed to explain his meaning generally.
jushi.chinese: 他未能把自己的意思完全说清楚。

jushi.english: We generally go to the sea for our holidays.
